ROM.Changelog: - Merge AOSP upstream (r33) (includes August 5 security patch) - OP3/T & OP5: improve DASH charging support - SDClang - Some fixes - Shorten animations to make everything snappier - cheeseburger: HiFi sound for microphone - cheeseburger: Fix audio effects like V4A, visualizer, ... - cheeseburger: Enable camera zero shutter delay - cheeseburger: Update vendor blobs - cheeseburger: Enable LTO and Clang optimizations - cheeseburger: Update fingerprints and oem stuff - cheeseburger: Update Linux kernel to 4.4.81 - cheeseburger: Build kernel with Linaro 7.1.1 toolchain
